Brand: T-SoX eHuntSun

The core values and goals of eHuntSun Health Technology Co., Ltd.

​

eHuntSun Health Technology Co., Ltd. is committed to developing an intelligent exercise management system, providing scientific health-related physical fitness assessment, and integrating and analyzing health-related multi-source heterogeneous data, and further applying it to the intelligent development of exercise equipment and providing community/commercial organizations with high-quality and precise health services.

​

The company integrates medical and health-related data with scientific technology, translates it for personalized exercise prescription design and exercise equipment development, and effectively manages health information and service feedback. Marketing product models include application in medical institutions for scientific rehabilitation, application in commercial fields to improve individual health and physical fitness, or promotion to the home to implement the goal of in-home health promotion. In addition, the company also provides smart circuit exercise sales, as well as, field operation planning and education services.

​

Taking the intelligent exercise management system as the antenna to expand the industrial development in the era of great health is the core value and goal of the company.

Brand: DARFON

Darfon Group integrates R&D, manufacturing and testing resources to provide a full range of services covering core technologies such as battery performance optimization, frame structure analysis, and intelligent power management systems, ensuring that every link from material selection, process optimization to global logistics is strictly quality controlled to create efficient and highly competitive products.
With our in-house Research & Development and Manufacturing team at our Taiwan headquarter, Darfon Energy Tech. provides a complete range of 36V and 48V eBike batteries for cycling enthusiasts worldwide. The capacities range from 200Wh to 1600Wh, and the batteries are UL and EN50604 certified. In addition to batteries, we also have the capability to design and produce chargers and accessories. We are leading the way with the introduction of USB PD3.1 technology, making eBike batteries and chargers smarter. In response to sustainability trends, we have established local manufacturing in three production bases: Europe, Vietnam, and Taiwan, to reduce the environmental costs during transportation.

Continuously innovating, KMC has expanded from chains to chainrings and cassettes, developing a complete drivetrain solution and establishing the brand identity of "KMC DRIVETRAIN EXPERT." description:
Brand: U.CR+

U.CR+ brand was established in 2009 under Bihe Creative Design Co., Ltd. In 2011, Jiezhang Co., Ltd. formed a joint venture with Caihe Original Co., Ltd. In 2013, a China operations center was set up in Shanghai. A total of 13 R&D projects have been carried out with an investment of NT$20 million, leading to 16 trademark applications, 6 patents, 1 invention, and 1 iF Design Award.

The company has promoted 35 public sports events and sponsored international racing teams. It has participated in 46 international exhibitions and provided sponsorships for the TV drama You Love Me, I Love You, as well as the 2018 movie Rope Angle (a part of the Gatao 4 series). Other recognitions include the Taiwan Excellence Award in 2017/2018, and the MIT Gold Quality Award in 2018/2019.

The company has participated in 46 exhibitions to promote its own brand. It has been actively involved in the Taipei International Cycle Show and the Taipei Sports Goods Exhibition for many years. Other past participation includes München ISPO in Germany, Korea ISPO, Japan Bike Show, Indonesia Sporting Fair, Nanjing and Beijing ISPO, Shanghai Bicycle Exhibition, Maggie Sourcing in the U.S., and Eurobike/ISPO in Germany.

Brand: GUEE

Guee is an innovative cycling brand that made its debut in 2010. Pronounced ‘Goeey,’ the name Guee evokes sensations of softness and stickiness, reflecting the comfort and superior performance that our products embody. Since our inception, we have been dedicated to creating premium cycling accessories that enhance every ride.

Inspired by the Guee concept, our product line has expanded to include a comprehensive range of high-quality accessories designed for both professional and recreational cyclists. Each Guee product is crafted with meticulous attention to detail and a commitment to excellence.

At Guee, we understand that comfort and performance are paramount for cyclists. That’s why we continually innovate and refine our designs to meet the evolving needs of the cycling community. Our accessories are not only functional but also stylish, ensuring that cyclists can enjoy both form and function on every journey.

Whether you’re a seasoned cyclist or a weekend rider, Guee products are designed to boost your cycling experience. We believe that the right accessories can make a significant difference, providing the support and reliability you need to perform at your best. With Guee, you can ride with confidence, knowing that you’re equipped with the best in cycling innovation.

Join us on our journey to make cycling more enjoyable and accessible for everyone. Discover the comfort, quality, and performance that define Guee, and experience the difference our products can make on your next ride.

Di Cheng specializes in silicone rubber extruding and molding products for more than 27 years. We are proud to win a solid reputation in Taiwan industry market. In 2005, we devoted ourselves to the medical disposable items by user demands. We would like to assistant Taiwan's biomedical develops and hospitals to do the good support in healthcare needs.

"Di Cheng" means "we can make it true." in Chinese pronunciation. We will do our best to accomplish each project for clients.We have sufficient manpower to run 15 molding projects per month. "High precision, high quality and punctual delivery" is our management goal of factory. We have assistant clients to accomplish several projects, like oxygen mask, breathing circuit and drainage tube, these projects also had approved by Chang Gung Memorial Hospital, PAHSCO and BenQ.

In the future, we will devote ourselves to more medical disposable items except the original silicone tubing, oring and foam sealing solution. Di Cheng is a factory with medical manufacture license and had passed ISO 9001 and ISO13485 certification. We would like to be a professional factory in silicone rubber extruding and molding industry, we also would like to be your trusted partner to create a win-win business situation. Invite you to be our partner to grow up together. The world is beautiful because of you and me in the future.

description: MAVIC, a French manufacturer of bicycle systems and equipment for cyclists, began its history in 1889 in Lyon thanks to Charles Idoux and Lucien Chanel. By joining forces to ‘manufacture and sell spare parts for bicycles’, they created MAVIC: Manufacture d'Articles Vélocipédiques Idoux et Chanel. For 130 years, the MAVIC teams have been designing and creating a whole range of technical and innovative equipment for cycling, from amateurs to professional riders. MAVIC is also at your side at the biggest road and off-road sporting events with its neutral technical assistance. Creativity, innovation and a passion for cycling unite all our employees at our headquarters in the French Alps, in Annecy and beyond in our international subsidiaries.

description:
Brand: GWA energy

GWA is a professional electric bicycle system R&D and manufacturing company based in Taiwan. Our mission is to provide an affordable, friendly and reliable eCargobike solution. GWA's solution integrates dual drive with high torque power, electric auto-shift transmission, ABS and full AIoT functions. Over the past decade, GWA has delivered over 100,000 eCargo bike kits to European customers.

(EN15194/ISO 13849/EN50604):
All GWA products have built-in CANBUS and Bluetooth communication.
1) Dual drive eCargobike system (ABS + auto-shift)
2) Electric auto-shift eBike system (super compact midDrive + auto-shift)
3) eGravel/eJunior eBike system (integrated controller battery + auto-shift)
4) eBike/eMotorcycle battery (48V 265Wh/530Wh/800Wh/1500Wh; Complies with EU battery passport requirements)
5) Software: Self-diagnosis, RMA service platform, Engineering APP, Customer APP, OTA, Battery Passport Tracing

In 2025, GWA will offer a series of state-of-the-art e-Drive systems for our e-Cargo bike customers.
Features/Functions & High-lights

Dual-drive systems advantages
	Reliability: load-sharing and motor redundancy
	Great Performance: double the torque power Improving climbing ability
	Stability: improves steering smoothness and stability

Auto-shift internal gear hub
	Superior riding experience 
	3-speed and 4-speed internal gear-hub
	Fast and smooth electronic gear shifting
	Smooth riding experience

Intelligent dual-drive controller with CANBUS, Bluetooth and OTA functions	
	High torque at low speed
	Supports speed-pedelec
	Electric LSD (Limited Slip Differential)
	Steering detection & calibration function + Tip-over protection function
	AIoT and OTA (Over-the-Air) update function

48V High-quality battery pack
	Safety & reliability (EN 50604 & EN/ISO 13849 certificated)
	Using Tier-1 lithium cells (Panasonic, LG, SDI)	
	500Wh ~ 750Wh long cycle-life design
	CANBUS

ABS (Anti-lock Braking System)
	Improve both the safety and efficiency of the hydraulic braking system
	Enhance riding stability and control for heavy duty eCargo bike
	Braking force balance control

Super high torque/weight ratio mid-motor
	48V250W >80N.m
	< 2Kg
	L:155mm x Φ:88mm

Latest regulation compliance (ISO 13849-1, EN 15194, EN 50604, prEN 17860)	
	Super high standards

Cycling computing, service, and engineering APPs
	Smartphone & IoT integration, huge cost saving for dealers

RMA cloud service for product traceability & warranty validation
	Product traceability & warranty validation

description:
Brand: Cycling FABRO

FABRO International started as a medical equipment trading company in 2001 and has been deeply rooted in Taiwan for over 20 years. With an open-minded approach, we continuously observe and adapt to the ever-changing market.

In 2018, recognizing the immense potential of Taiwan's cycling apparel market, we expanded into this sector. Today, we are the largest importer and retailer of cycling apparel in Taiwan. Within just five years, we have established six directly operated stores in Taipei, Hsinchu, Taichung, Kaohsiung, Xindian, and Tainan, along with our own e-commerce platform.

While transitioning from the medical industry to the cycling industry may seem like a major shift, what has remained constant is our vision, innovation, and commitment to warmth. As we look ahead to the next 20 years, we remain dedicated to providing our partners and customers with products and services that embody both quality and care.

In 2024, we expanded further into the cycling industry by introducing high-end custom bike services, aiming to offer cyclists an exceptional riding experience!

description:
Company Profile
Founded in 1986 in central Taiwan, Yi Hsian is a manufacturer specializing in socks and seamless warp-knitted garments, focusing on knitted product and technology development, now in its third generation.

• Circular Knitting Machine Division: Computerized jacquard sock machine | Capacity: 90,000 pairs/month
With nearly 40 years of experience, we primarily operate in a B2B model, designing and manufacturing various socks for brands, including men’s and women’s socks, 3D socks, sports socks, children’s tights, women’s pantyhose, and men’s leggings.

• Warp Knitting Division: Double needle bar computerized jacquard machine | Capacity: 60,000 garments/month
In 2010, we began introducing electronic jacquard machines from Italy's Santoni and Germany's Karlmayer, enabling seamless garment production and development of everyday basics to meet diverse customer needs.

In 2022, we acquired a 138” wide Karlmayer warp knitting machine to expand production capacity.

Our product line has evolved from traditional socks to include elastic sportswear, sports underwear, fashionable knitted garments, gloves, corrective clothing, eco-friendly bags, and medical products.
________________________________________
Technical Advantages
Yi Hsian is among the few manufacturers with seamless warp knitting machines. By mastering piezo jacquard systems and computer-controlled shifting technology, we can create unique knit patterns beyond factory settings, develop patented structures, and offer distinctive products for customers.

Our library includes over 2,000 patterns and designs, compatible with Santoni and Karlmayer equipment, providing strong support for product development.

description:
Brand: Tannus

Tannus specializes in puncture-proof tire technology, leveraging over 15 years of research and development in innovative materials.

Key Products & Technologies
Tannus is known for its Aither Technology, a patented material offering durability, lightweight performance, and eco-friendliness. Their product range includes:

Tannus Airless Tires – 100% puncture-proof, maintenance-free, and designed for urban commuting, bike rentals, and delivery services.
Tannus Armour – A tire insert that reduces punctures by 90% while improving grip and balance, popular among MTB riders.
Tannus Tubeless – A modular tubeless insert offering rim protection, sidewall stability, and run-flat capability for professional riders.
Sustainability & Innovation
Tannus is committed to reducing waste and developing environmentally friendly solutions. Their airless tires eliminate the need for inner tubes, significantly reducing tire waste. The company follows strict sustainability standards, using recyclable materials and minimizing harmful chemicals.

Market & Business Model
Tannus works with OEM partners, distributors, and retailers worldwide, offering tailored solutions for cargo bikes, bike-sharing programs, and commuter markets. They provide flexible B2B solutions, including stock availability, no MOQ (Minimum Order Quantity), and customized support for their partners.

Tannus continues to push the boundaries of cycling technology, focusing on performance, sustainability, and rider safety.

description:
Brand: TTN Bearing

TTN, Young Sing Bearing Co., Ltd. was established in 1976 who is a Taiwan professional manufacturer of bearings. TTN has developed many new kinds of bearings and is committed to innovation and technological progress and development. With the advantage of machining technology, we continue to develop bearings for precision mechanical components and vehicle components. 
TTN pass through ISO 9001 and IATF16949 certification in order to ensure that the quality of each product conforms to international standards of RoHS, Reach, and CPSIA. Excellent quality and perfect service are our commitments.
The most representative of the ball bearings is the deep groove ball bearing, which is the most widely used bearing structure and is also the main product of TTN. As the name implies, the deep groove ball bearing is to process the inner and outer rings of the bearing into a circular arc deep groove-like track. The ball (made of steel) rotates on it, and can withstand certain radial and axial loads at the same time. It is suitable for high-speed rotation, low noise and other circumstances. Ball bearings are widely used due to the following advantages:
1. The bearing size has been standardized and specified internationally.
2. It can withstand certain radial and axial loads at the same time.
3. With proper selection of grease, it can be used under high or low temperature conditions.
4. It has excellent performance under high-speed conditions.
TTN offers high-quality ceramic bearings in the bicycle industry, which perfectly demonstrates the small and lightweight rotational friction characteristics. Therefore, many bicycle parts manufacturers and bicycle enthusiasts have chosen ceramic bearings to upgrade their bicycle performance.

With nearly 40 years of experience in serving the industry, our future development will build upon our strong team quality and technical capabilities. description:
Brand: RideWrap

What is Bicycle Protection? It’s a clear, durable film that shields high-wear areas of a bike from scratches, chips, and scuffs caused by rocks, debris, and everyday use. Our protection solutions range from single-piece coverage for key areas like chainstays, downtubes, and cable rub zones, to comprehensive options covering 30%, 60%, or 95% of the bike. Unlike basic 3M materials, RideWrap's proprietary Lotus Pro™ bicycle protection film is purpose-built: non-yellowing, self-healing, and made from recycled materials.
With in-house design services and precision manufacturing processes, we work directly with brands and facilities to create custom protection solutions that integrate seamlessly into their bikes. Our technology helps brands deliver more value to customers by protecting their investment while enhancing product aesthetics and performance.

If you're a product manager from a brand or a buyer from a manufacturing facility, come by and see us at the show to learn how RideWrap can protect your bikes and elevate your product offerings!

Brand: HTI

Hantai｜Screw pre-coating anti-loosening treatment, industrial adhesive - a professional production agent trusted by customers
Hantai Company is one of the affiliated enterprises of Taiwan Loctai Group Company. It was established in Taoyuan County in 1995. It is engaged in professional screw loosening processing services. Our company is a professional agent for industrial adhesives, automated dispensing equipment and screw locking adhesives. We are also the leader in industrial adhesives in Taiwan.

The purpose of our company's services is to serve you with an enthusiastic and responsible attitude, a spirit of sincerity and integrity, and professional technology. At the same time, we are a company that has won the IS0 9001 international quality certification. In various industrial manufacturing processes, we strive to For better and longer-lasting product quality, industrial adhesives and screw locking glue have become indispensable and important items in many manufacturing processes. Hantai specializes in solving problems caused by product design, maintenance, and production requirements for customers. High-quality industrial adhesives, screw locking glue and other related products simplify the manufacturing process, reduce customers' assembly costs, improve assembly time, and improve the yield of production lines and products.

The growth of enterprises requires mutual interaction and support. Hantai provides customers with the highest quality screw pre-coating and anti-loosening treatments, screw anti-loosening glue, industrial adhesives and other related products and impregnation processing services with an honest, serious and responsible attitude. , in terms of product applications, screws treated with Hantai screw locking glue can be used in various products according to different screw locking glue types, such as various 3C electronic products, automobiles, motorcycles, and aerospace and military buckles. Parts and fasteners for various heavy industrial machines, etc.

Just make a phone call and our engineers will be ready to serve you at any time. Now just give us your needs and we will be happy to arrange all our colleagues immediately to provide you with perfect services and solve your process and production line problems. For related questions, if you have any needs for screw anti-loosening treatment, screw anti-loosening glue, industrial adhesives, impregnation processing, etc., Hantai welcomes you to contact us at any time, and looks forward to advice from all walks of life, so that Hantai can make further progress and provide sustainable quality products. service, thank you!

The founder of Fitting Sports is a former badminton athlete who transitioned into the field of sports science after retirement. Dedicated to applying laboratory research to real-world athletic performance, the company focuses on developing professional products tailored to the needs of different sports, aiming to enhance performance and reduce the risk of injury.

During our research, we discovered that although sports socks may seem insignificant, they actually play a crucial role in athletic performance. They not only provide excellent support and friction for the feet but also help absorb impact effectively. That’s why we collaborated with the Innovation Sports Technology Lab at National Pingtung University of Science and Technology to develop our patented Pressure Curve Functional Socks (Patent No. I817559). These socks offer exceptional comfort and protection, whether for everyday wear or during sports activities. (For detailed data, please refer to the product description!)

REXON was established in 1972 and has a comprehensive development, manufacturing, quality control, and management system. Since 2021, it has been implementing its corporate sustainability commitment.

The factory area exceeds 38,000 square meters, with over 1,000 employees. The development technology team consists of more than 100 people. REXON owns over 600 design patents and has won more than 20 international awards.
It is certified by ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 14064, and ISO 14067.
REXON won the 2023 TCSA Traditional Manufacturing – Gold Award and the 2024 Potential Taiwan Mittelstand Award.
Its production fields include fitness equipment, power tools, woodworking machinery, BLDC motors, bicycles, and eBike mid-drive motors.

Collaborative clients include well-known brands such as Technogym, Peloton, Life Fitness, DeWALT, Milwaukee, Bosch, Ridgid, Matrix, and more.
Building on its strengths in manufacturing and development, REXON is dedicated to providing customers with motor, electronic control, mechanical, and various process services, solving the challenges customers face.
REXON is committed to ensuring product quality through its procurement and quality control processes to meet customer needs.
Better for Prosperity, Goodness, and Sharing. We are dedicated to creating a better environment, achieving mutual prosperity, common good, and sharing, to create a bright future for society and the Earth.

description:
Yota Cycles Co., Ltd., based in Taiwan, specializes in the design, manufacturing, and customization of high-quality bicycles and e-bikes. With extensive experience in OEM and ODM services, we provide comprehensive solutions from product concept design to mass production, helping our clients achieve their brand and market goals.

Our Strengths
1. Advanced Production Facilities:
Currently, our annual production capacity is 30,000 e-bikes. By Q1 2025, our new factory will be operational, increasing our capacity to 100,000 units annually. The new facility will feature the latest 360-degree universal assembly line from Holland Mechanics, enhancing production efficiency by 35%.
2. Exceptional Quality Control:
We implement a comprehensive Quality Management System (QMS) to ensure all products meet the highest quality standards. Our system incorporates data traceability, enabling a clear record of each bike’s production history.
3. Flexible Customization Services:
We excel in providing tailor-made solutions, including branding, specification adjustments, and target price realization, helping clients expand their market presence.

Vision for the Future
Yota Cycles is dedicated to continuous innovation and technological development. Our new factory will feature comprehensive testing facilities, including a braking test slope, a silent tunnel for noise detection, and video inspection systems, to enhance product performance and user experience. Guided by our core values of "Quality First, Innovation Leading," we aim to become a trusted partner in the global market, working with clients to create a sustainable future.

Wheel Giant was formally established as a company in 1984.  Founder Grace Ruan positioned Wheel Giant as an all-around professional bicycle information source, and for close to forty years the company has worked alongside and grown together with Taiwanese bicycle industry.   As a result, Wheel Giant thoroughly understands the needs and hopes ofthe industry and consumers, and has established deep bonds with both. 

As a proud member of the bicycle industry for 35 years, Wheel Giant is motivated by its
enthusiastic spirit of service and sense of mission to the industry to constantly remain at the
forefront of trends while continually striving to uncover even greater markets and opportunities
for the industry. Responding to the Internet revolution and the boom in digital publishing, Wheel
Giant embarked on the publication of e-books four years ago, and has since introduced a TBS
e-book and App, Cycling Update e-book and App, Bicycling e-book and App, and Outside e-book
and App. Wheel Giant's successful integration of print, the Internet, and digital development
delivers information and marketing to the world's doorstep

Looking ahead to the next 35 years, we at Wheel Giant pledge to always serve the cycle
industry to the full extent of our ability, and we hope that our ceaseless efforts will make even
greater contributions to the industry

description:
Brand: JATCO

About JATCO Ltd
JATCO is headquartered in Fuji, Shizuoka, Japan and as an automotive transmission manufacturer, delivered over 129 million automatic transmissions (ATs and CVTs) globally.
 
JATCO is also pushing forward with the challenge of new businesses in a variety of areas such as drive units for electric-assist bicycles and electric motorcycles. leveraging its technologies in electrified automotive powertrains to develop a 2-in-1 drive unit for bicycles that integrates an electric-assist motor with a gearbox.
 
JATCO’s drive unit allows for a compact and highly flexible design. It also features the high level of quality JATCO has refined through its automotive transmissions.
The electric-assist bicycle with a JATCO drive unit is scheduled to be launched onto the market by 2025.

Brand: ATOLI  愛托力

New Chain-tongs Co., Ltd. was founded in Dali District, Taichung in 1974. It specializes in the development and manufacturing of Atoli brand hydraulic riveting machines, air-pressure dual-axis riveting machines and other equipment. It has two production plants and a corporate headquarters to serve domestic and foreign customers. Its production capacity and related technical experience have reached international standards. The durability and efficiency of its rivet machine products have long been recognized and loved by many customers. In addition to the operating headquarters in Taichung, Taiwan, New Chain-tongs also established a branch of the Atoli brand in Dongguan, China in 2000 to serve customers in Guangdong. In addition, an office has been established in Kunshan City to handle business needs in Northeast China. With the support of multi-functional and diversified bases, New Chain-tongs has not only established a fast supply pipeline, but also further improved and optimized the quality and efficiency of related services. At present, the main products include rivet machines, magnetic drill tables, automatic tapping machines and high-speed precision drilling machines. Among them, the rivet machine series products are more widely adopted by major manufacturers in the industry.

description:
Brand: YUNG FANG

Yung Fang Plastics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1977, initially specializing in plastic casings for batteries. In 1981, we officially entered the bicycle industry, responding to the shift in materials and growing demand for plastic components. Our success today is made possible by the longstanding support of our industry partners.

With over 40 years of experience, Yung Fang Plastics has evolved from its founding generation to the next, continuously innovating. Our product line includes chain guards, mudguards, spoke protectors, plastic baskets, pumps, and other bicycle accessories. In 2010, we developed the aluminum-plastic mudguard, combining the aesthetics of metal with the advantages of plastic. That same year, we established a mold department, expanding our expertise in plastic component manufacturing.

Headquartered in Taiwan, with a branch in Kunshan, we have 130 employees and serve customers across Asia, Europe, the U.S., and beyond. Committed to R&D and quality, we have also invested in ESG initiatives, striving for sustainable economic, environmental, and social impact.

Looking ahead, Yung Fang Plastics will continue to innovate, providing high-quality plastic components and services to cycling enthusiasts worldwide.

description:
Brand: PAX

YEE JEE Technology was established in 1981. Located in Nantou, Taiwan, we are known globally by PAX.
We focus on the production of high-quality tire repairs for over 40 years. Nowadays, we expanded our product lines to include DIY tools and bicycle repairing tools. For those years, we stick to using 100% natural rubber as our tire patch materials, to ensure durability and user safety.
